title: 26: No Such Thing As A Yeti Fact
content: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and special guest Simon Rich discuss chimps with pets, Kama Sutra crosswords, slinkies on escalators and sagging yeti breasts.
